Summary: White Star-like object moving rapidly, would blink on/off with long pauses. Object was heading Southwest.
divs: sighting detailswhile outside smoking a cigarette in north houston, i noticed a really bright blinking white star like object moving very fast, going towards southwest houston. the light was blinking on\ off with a long pause in between. the object seemed to be pulsating. this was not an aircraft, nor a meteorite.
